sqlQuery.name: AllDatasets
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id FROM apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter WHERE (category is null OR category != 'Link outs') AND project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' EXCEPT SELECT dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id FROM apidbtuning.datasetproperty WHERE property='isPublic' and value='false'

SELECT dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id FROM apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter WHERE (category is null OR category != 'Link outs') AND project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' and dataset_presenter_id in (select dataset_presenter_id from apidbtuning.datasetproperty where property='isPublic' and value='true' ) UNION select dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter where (category is null OR category != 'Link outs') and project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' and '@SHOW_UNRELEASED_DATA@' = 'true' and dataset_presenter_id in (select dataset_presenter_id from apidbtuning.datasetproperty where property='isPublic' and value='false' )
select dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter where (category is null OR category != 'Link outs') and project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@'

sqlQuery.name: SitemapDatasets
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id FROM apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter WHERE project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@'

sqlQuery.name: SitemapDatasets
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT dpres.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id FROM apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dpres, apidbtuning.datasetproperty dprop WHERE dpres.dataset_presenter_id = dprop.dataset_presenter_id AND dprop.property = 'isPublic' and dprop.value = 'true' AND dpres.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@'

sqlQuery.name: MapStudiesForToolbar
sqlQuery.sql: select dpres.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dpres, apidbtuning.datasetproperty dprop where dpres.dataset_presenter_id = dprop.dataset_presenter_id and dprop.property = 'isPublic' -- and dprop.value = 'true' and dpres.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' intersect select dpres.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dpres, apidbtuning.datasetproperty dprop where dpres.dataset_presenter_id = dprop.dataset_presenter_id and dprop.property = 'templateInjectorClassName' and dprop.value = 'GenomicsEDAStudy' and dpres.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@'

select dpres.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dpres, apidbtuning.datasetproperty dprop where dpres.dataset_presenter_id = dprop.dataset_presenter_id and dprop.property = 'isPublic' -- and dprop.value = 'true' --and dpres.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' intersect select dpres.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dpres, apidbtuning.datasetproperty dprop where dpres.dataset_presenter_id = dprop.dataset_presenter_id and dprop.property = 'templateInjectorClassName' and dprop.value = 'GenomicsEDAStudy' --and dpres.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' -- we need this condition currently because no geolocation studies show up (the new plasmo dataset) and dpres.dataset_presenter_id = 'DS_480c976ef9'

sqlQuery.name: ByReferenceName
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ref.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id, ref.target_name, ref.record_type, dnt.TAXON_ID FROM apidbtuning.datasetmodelref ref, apidbtuning.datasetnametaxon dnt WHERE ref.DATASET_PRESENTER_ID = dnt.DATASET_PRESENTER_ID AND ('any' = '$$taxon$$' or (dnt.taxon_id = 0 or dnt.taxon_id = $$taxon$$)) AND ref.target_name = $$reference_name$$ AND ref.record_type = $$record_class$$

sqlQuery.name: ByReferenceNameNoTaxon
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ref.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id, ref.target_name, ref.record_type FROM apidbtuning.datasetmodelref ref, apidbtuning.datasetnametaxon dnt WHERE ref.dataset_presenter_id = dnt.dataset_presenter_id AND ref.target_name = $$reference_name$$ AND ref.record_type = $$record_class$$

sqlQuery.name: ById
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id FROM APIDBTUNING.datasetnametaxon WHERE dataset_presenter_id in ($$dataset_id$$)

sqlQuery.name: ByExternalDatabaseNames
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id FROM APIDBTUNING.datasetnametaxon WHERE name IN ($$dataset_name$$)

sqlQuery.name: ByQuestionName
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT dsp.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id FROM apidbtuning.datasetmodelref ref, apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dsp WHERE dsp.dataset_presenter_id = ref.dataset_presenter_id AND ref.target_name = $$question_name$$ AND ref.target_type = 'question' AND dsp.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@'

sqlQuery.name: ByRecordClass
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT dsp.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id FROM apidbtuning.datasetmodelref ref, apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dsp WHERE dsp.dataset_presenter_id = ref.dataset_presenter_id AND ref.record_type = $$record_class$$ AND ref.target_type IN ('table', 'attribute','profile_graph') AND dsp.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@'

sqlQuery.name: ByType
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT dsp.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id FROM apidbtuning.datasetmodelref ref, apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dsp WHERE dsp.dataset_presenter_id = ref.dataset_presenter_id AND ref.record_type = $$record_class$$ AND dsp.type = $$dataset_type$$ AND dsp.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@'

sqlQuery.name: ByTypeAndSubtype
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT dsp.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id FROM apidbtuning.datasetmodelref ref, apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dsp WHERE dsp.dataset_presenter_id = ref.dataset_presenter_id AND ref.record_type = $$record_class$$ AND dsp.type = $$dataset_type$$ AND (dsp.subtype = $$dataset_subtype$$ OR dsp.display_category = $$dataset_subtype$$) AND dsp.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@'

sqlQuery.name: ByCategoryAndSubtype
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT dsp.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id FROM apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dsp WHERE dsp.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' AND (category IS NULL and dsp.display_category = $$dataset_category$$) OR (dsp.display_category IS NULL and dsp.category = $$dataset_category$$) OR (coalesce(dsp.display_category, dsp.category) = $$dataset_category$$ and case when lower(category) = 'phenotype' OR lower(display_category) = 'phenotype' then 'phenotype' else lower(subtype) end like lower($$dataset_subtype$$) ) OR (dsp.category = 'Immunology' AND lower(display_category) = lower($$dataset_subtype$$) ) OR coalesce(dsp.category, dsp.display_category) = $$dataset_category$$

sqlQuery.name: ByCategoryAndOrganism
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT dsp.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id FROM apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dsp, apidbtuning.datasetnametaxon dnt, sres.taxonname tn WHERE coalesce(dsp.display_category, dsp.category) = $$dataset_category$$ AND dsp.dataset_presenter_id = dnt.dataset_presenter_id AND dnt.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND tn.name_class = 'scientific name' AND tn.name = $$organism$$ AND dsp.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@'

sqlQuery.name: ByUserId
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT d.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id, d.dataset_presenter_id as study_id, CASE WHEN u.study_access is null THEN d.study_access ELSE u.study_access END as restriction_level FROM ( select dataset_presenter_id, value as study_access from apidbtuning.datasetproperty where property = 'studyAccess' ) d LEFT JOIN ( select v.dataset_presenter_id, r.name as study_access from studyaccess.end_users@ACCT_DBLINK@ v INNER JOIN studyaccess.restriction_level@ACCT_DBLINK@ r ON v.restriction_level_id = r.restriction_level_id WHERE user_id = $$user_id$$ AND (approval_status_id < 1 or approval_status_id is NULL) ) u ON d.dataset_presenter_id = u.dataset_presenter_id

sqlQuery.name: AllDatasets
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT dataset_presenter_id, dataset_presenter_name, project_name FROM apidb.legacydataset WHERE project_name = '@PROJECT_ID@'
